TestCase.CaseDescription: Insert duplicate courseName, query should fail Expected error: Can not add due to UNIQUE constraint on courseName
TestCase.SQLScript: select @courseName := courseName from Courses order by 1 limit 1; insert into Courses (courseId, courseName, courseNumber, majorId, scheduleId, stateId, description, location) values (UUID(), @courseName, 260, 3, 1, 'On', 'Enterprise Software Platforms', 'Misson College');
